IntermediateRuby     about

Learn Intermediate Ruby, make more money

I got into software development for a few reasons:

  • I like to solve problems at scale
  • I like to be well paid
  • I like to do many things besides software development, and being a good software developer leaves lots of time in my life to do those other things, like rock climbing, reading books, hanging out with my family, and much more.

The better I‚Äôve gotten at the core piece of software development, the more items from this list I get to have.

Ironically, by being a better software developer I can spend less time writing code, and be better paid for it.

It took me a few years to learn what I know now. I want you to learn everything I know in half the time it took me to learn it.

That‚Äôs what this project is all about.
